metadata.name: Dreamer by Pablo Stanley
metadata.description:
Escape into a world of daydreams with this captivating black-and-white digital inking artwork by Pablo Stanley. A young and imaginative character takes center stage, slowly wandering with a sense of wonder and no specific destination.

The character is adorned with a backpack and a sword, symbols of their adventurous spirit, yet they move with a dreamy, slow pace. Despite the robotic enhancements in their head and prosthetic leg, this protagonist is consumed by their thoughts and the endless possibilities of their imagination.

This artwork captures the beauty of letting your mind wander and embracing the power of daydreaming.

Dreamer by Pablo Stanley is the 2nd Audio Galleries Artist Edition.
